text:
[Verse]
Darkness falls we come alive
Neon lights we start to thrive
Every pulse a heartbeat bold
Shadows dance as night unfolds

[Verse 2]
Feet on fire rhythm loud
Feel the beat inside the crowd
Lost in music lose control
Forget it all let’s rock and roll

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows in the night
Underneath the neon lights
Feel the rhythm feel the glow
Let the energy just flow

[Verse 3]
Hands up high we touch the stars
Through the beats we break the bars
No more fear just let it be
Take the chance and set it free

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows in the night
Underneath the neon lights
Feel the rhythm feel the glow
Let the energy just flow

[Bridge]
Eyes shut tight feel the rain
Through the storm we’ll dance again
In the dark we find our way
Shadows bright till break of day
title: Dancing Shadows
